'''Figure 3.''' Urine collecting bag reflecting macroscopic haematuria [[File:Figure 3 urine collection bag HUbis.jpg|neant|vignette|'''Figure 3.''' Urine collecting bag reflecting macroscopic haematuria]]

question.title: What is the primary cause of macroscopic haematuria?

option_a.title: Infection
option_a.description: A bacterial or viral infection can cause haematuria

option_b.title: Kidney stones
option_b.description: Kidney stones can cause haematuria due to their size and location

option_c.title: Blood loss
option_c.description: Blood loss from a trauma or surgery can cause haematuria

option_d.title: Genetic disorders
option_d.description: Genetic disorders can cause haematuria due to underlying conditions

correct_option.title: option_a
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
